title: PBE OCE sign ups ðŸ”§
body:
With the release of the PBE signups returning, has anyone actually had luck with signing up?

I can't seem to get the link to work due to a high volume of traffic on the page/link. 

HELP!! 

Also can someone clarify if OCE is eligible for PBE signups, cause a while back OCE wasn't and i'm not sure if that's still the case today. 

Thanks :D{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}

replies.body:
Yup already signed up and experienced 200 ping xD

I might avoid PBE for a while ...

Reiterating CryoxCandy's comment, players in Oceania *are* eligible for the Public Beta Environment now!

> Your live League of Legends account must be honor level 3 with no bans or restrictions in order to sign up. Your account can be on any region (except Korea) and any level. You can check your PBE eligibility by logging in [here](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/pbe).

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ

\#hype

The guidelines for a PBE account is linked here: 
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ

Though I wouldn't recommend trying to get a PBE account as the server is located in NA therefore you would have 100~250 ms which is quite difficult to play with.
